Description: Dissadvantage on next roll or check
Puts out lights in an area
Instills fear, targets must make will save or move away from caster
Deteriorates armor and weapons
Gives the target a random painful event
Drain 1D20 of Mana from target and regain 1/2 for yourself
Kills any other spells.
Shoots 6 spikes of Stygian metal from your hand
Transforms what is being targeted into a more beastial or monsterous version, turning animals into dire beasts, and beastman into ferals, all under the casters control.
This spell ensares the mind of whoever it's cast upon, corrupting them to fulfill whatever desire the cast has for them to do,
This spell cleaves through meat and flesh with ease, bypassing armor and shields, this spell splits and rends the organic, making it do nothing to the nonorganic.
Reverse the attack that comes for you, more effective on spells but can work on physical hits forces the deliverer to take the damage from their ownn hit.

Upon being cast the monolith begins a countdown, upon reaching 0 it detonates obliterating all life within it's reach, turning it all to nothing but fragile obsidian like glass. Also causes the Caster to loose conciousness.
Encases whatever weapon is in hand with an obsidian like material that empowers the weapon, quadrupling it's damage.

Encases the Caster's body in a weave of the black, making their bodies an armored vessel, gain +20 AC, the only way to break it is with blunt trauma, 1d6 times, or being Hit with a similar strength White magic spell.

A projectile spell that takes several turns to charge before firing, but upon release and contact with a target detonates a 25ft cone that traps anyone in the radius within a sheet of the black. They take 5d10 damage a turn, until freed with a DC check of 19, or being freed by similar level white magic.
Cancel magic on successful roll, is shaped like a shield
See alignment of things
Purifies items or people
Create an orb of light that follows you
Detect life, You can see life signs through walls
Coats weapon in radiant magic
Create a holy damage projectile
Gifts someone a normally personal effect of a spell, or it provides a count of advantage on your next check if used without another spell.
Increases caster's strength using their casting modifer for an amount of time
Can repair items, even magical ones using holy light and white magic. If it's missing large chunks it gets replaced by a pure alabaster stone.
Grants an ally double advantage on a skill check
Creates a mantle of light onto yourself, providing +8DR, +2AC, and giving your weapons the ability to fire holy bolts of light.
Summons a Valkyrie to assist you

Creates slabs or blocks of pure crystalized holy magic that can be used in vast multitudes of ways, from making pathways to making tools, it can preform whatever is needed of it, including turning into a shield, but not a weapon.
A massive holy blast centered on yourself.
Summons a semblance of the Blade Heavens gate in your hand.
Cantrip:summons an sprite of random elemental flavor 4 at a time
Summons lesser elemental inkarnate elemental cheap and simple but can summon more than one at a time. 0.5 summon slot cost. Dex type
Summons golem style elemental. These are your tanks. 3 summon slots. Con type
Summons a higher elemental versatile and useful a good mix of health, defense and offense. 2 summon slots. Wis type
Summons a spell casting turret. 1 summon slot. Int type
Summons an elemental humanoid homunculus, a helping hand of many ways, partially to fully sapient. 1 summon slot. Cha type
Summons a serpentine/draconic elemental, large and menacing heavy hitter. 4 summon slots. Str type
Raises an amount of skeletons or one large skeleton, bones must be provided
Reduces the durability of affected item
Allows user to talk to dead
Drains life from opponent and gives half to the caster
Necrotic ray of flesh rot.
Force any nearby undead to pass back into death.
Cause the target to have their flesh painfully start to decay
Become incorporeal for a time, and return to a corporeal form with a secondary casting of the spell for less mana. 4 mana to cast and 2 to return
Creates a ghostly servant, allowing the animation of Wraiths ghosts and similar undead.

Spreads Blighted groudn in the area, causing undead and spells to be more powerful, also saps the life out of any weak creatures and has a small chance to cause death. Anything that dies in the blight is reanimated into an undead controlled by the caster for 1d6 rounds.

Launches a ghastly ball at your enemies it deals necrotic damage, if the target ends up dying to this attack the Mage gains it's soul, which can be expended in casting Wraith to make a more powerful incorpreal undead.

Projects a ray that inflicts necrotic energy, and is incredibly deadly to swarms of anything living, also it has the added benefit of causing decay on living matter, allowing it's use to Rot through doors or anything wooden.

Makes a massive area whither instantly, and blight to spread all over the area, sapping the life out of everything around. Causing necrotic damage to slowly build up on all enemies within the area, but heals undead every turn.
A ghostly bolt that can hit multipe targets in a line, passing through each target.
Summon a lich like apparation, weilding a pair of scythes
Mass reanimation spell, which can raise 20 corpses at once.
Deal poison damage on a touch.
Slows target
Summons either three small rats, or one large rat
Infects target with a disease, roll a d20 to dertermine the disease.
Spit a  ray of caustic acid at opponent.
Summon a medium green slime.
A blast of acid for 1D12 per square
2 square wall of sticky goo.
Target is forced to have disadvantage on any strength related checks for 1d8 turns.
Creates a swarm of creatures that follow the caster's commands, Consult Dm's swarm table for what is summon.
Forces someone to develop Vampirism and are inflicted with it temporarily, unless it's coupled with Disease.
Forces someone to develop lycanthropy and transform, becoming enraged and attacking all people in the vacinity. Inflicts True lycanthropy when paired with disease.
Causes the target to petrify,  encasing them in stone. requires target failed a reflex, Fortitude, and Will save, if they succeed at least 1 it's not permenant.
Causes target to be wracked with temporary damage, which can render them immoblie and helpless, if used one target with low enough HP.
Creates a full squad of Fetid Gnolls, who obey the caster without question, or if used before Fetid Gnolls they pledge allegiance to the caster.
Creates a large area of green clouds that inflict damage over time, debuffs and strengthens disease magic.
Encases fist in rock
Creates a stone pillar
Summon a rock projectile
Creates a rock wall
Softens earth, or can be used as a ray of blinding sand that pelts it's target
Creates a pool of quicksand. Can only be cast on soft earth.
Creates a whip of sand
Allows user to repair small items made of earthen material(rock & metal)
Launches a torrent of rocks and gravel from the ground to land onto a specific target and area
Fires a Shard of crystalized earth that soars through the air at a target, upon impact it shatters, showering the target with razor sharp crystal shards.
Creates a singular spike of rock to burst out of the ground and stab the target.

Creates a rift in the earth, a chasm that allows safe passage down, to an underground cave, or subteranean area with ease, also can be used inside dungeons to go to the next floor if the way down is blocked.
Causes a severe localized earthquake, deals 10 times the damage to structures.
Creates a moderately sized boulder and launches it with lethal force.
Creates a soldier made of stone and clay, each one costs 6 mana. You can summon a maximum of 20 at a time. This spell CAN be learned out of book sequence.

Causes a massive floating crystal grow in the room, which emenates empowering magic, which regens mana. This crystal also periodically fires small shards of crystal at hostiles. Once a turn unleashes 1d12  flakes that fly at enemies.
Coats weapon in fire for 1D6 extra damage.
Coats weapon in ice for 1D6 extra damage.
Create a beam of damage that extends your weapon's range
Stick your weapon in the ground to coat it in stone to increment the weapon's damage die.

Coats the weapon in thorny vines that when they strike a target leave the weapon and embed in the target, dealing a lingering damage when they preform complicated actions, which includes attacking, running, and dodging. These vines can have Growth magic focused onto them.
Creates a coating upon the weapon which allows the weapon to pierce even the fiercest of armors. Grand level piercing. Also delivers a mild poison. 1d4 poison.

Coats the weapon in a flow of Acid which can rapidly eat throw most materials with ease. This acid also acts as a slimey fluid which enhances the length of the given weapon, increasing it's base damage dice by 1D.
Coats the weapon with a layer of contagious rust, that upon hitting other metal causes them to rapidly corrode, this effect works on all metal objects, and once it starts only a Wish may stop it.

Coats the weapon in a tornado allowing you to swing it with wild abandon. Grants 2 additional melee attack with this weapon, also allows the caster to fling low weight objects at enemies. You can also expend the spell to make it release a massive burst of air, which can prevent fall damage.

Every swing of your weapon now carries a tremendous amount of raw force behind it, and upon contact with an emeny or most object inficts a burst of magic that upon a failed save (save is 10+casting stat+level of spell) can shatter any non magical objects or send an oponent flying 1d12 squares.

Coats the weapon in a vaccum of incredible pressure, that saws at the air aitself as it swings. This coating delivers multipe dice of damage on hit and utterly eviserates living foes. Also upon expending the spell the caster can direct a blast of 4d10 squares of water at an area.

A Stygian coating engulfs your weapon, inflicting deadly necrotic power with every strike, if it's stabbed into a dead enemy or kills and enemy that corpse rises as an undead under the casters control. Also if expended at a target it will deal a blast of 8d6 necrotic power that if it manages to kill a target they rise as a greater under the casters control.
Add caster's int modifier to either hit or damage.
Add +2 to AC
Longer spells or apply to weapons or armor to briefly enchant with a spell.
Mends natural things, not wood.
Summons an animated sword
sumons a weapon of your chosing
Enhances everything except to hit.
Can permenantly enchant a weapon with a magical effect.
Fire ray
Ignites flammable object
Boils liquids not in a living entity
Touch and set on fire (deals 1D6 each round) for 1D4 rounds
Cast a fireball
Blast of steam, either out of impliment or mouth
Heats an area
Resist 10 fire damage
A controllable Mobile sphere that ignites and burns the area around it, moves 30ft as turn.
Launches a explosive fireball
Creates a pillar of fire that also deals damage in a blast radius around it.
Causes a massive area to be engulfed in flames, spreading from the caster, increasing fire magic damage and causing Damage over time.
Sends out a cone of dragons breathe, which pushes targets back, taking damage for every square their moved in the cone.
Causes the target to erupt in an explosion. Especially effective on target's encased in the Black.
Summons a Large Tine Scorpion, a massive molten scorpion drom the guts of a volcano, capable of being a mount or even a seige weapon it's it's lava spewing tail.
Pushes your target 1D6 ft
Balance and stablize yourself or your target.
Stops your target, heavier items can be held for less time
Pulls target towards you
Lifts objects and creatures
Forces an object away from you centered on your hand.
Add your spell modifier to your jump
MAGIC MISSILES!!!
Encases a Target in a nearly unbreakable Prison of Force
Allows you to block an enemy melee attack using a spell, like a sheidl without being encumbered by one.
Creates a sphere of pure force that can be used for all manner of utility or combat roles.
Creates a barrier around yourself, has 6D10 health.
Forces all targets in the room to crumple to the floor from overwhelming pressure, rending them unabel to move or take any actions. Nonlethal.
Inflicts a horrible crushing attack on a target, if the target is wearing armor, damage doubles.
Coats the Caster's body in a suit of raw force magic,  which takes no damage from non magical attacks.
Creates a wall in front of the caster made of force magic.
Grows plants from nothing in a 3X3
Creates a whip from plants with 30 ft of reach
Ensnares living creatures
Touch poison that lasts until the creature makes con save
Creates a thorn grove that inflicts damage per square
Grows a fruit that heals 1D10 upon consumption
Leeches life from the creature hit
Cast on a corpse this will animate the corpse with plants temporarily bringing it back to life, when used on a target that died after the spell 'Seed' was used it lowers the cost to cast.
Roots the target/Caster in place, and gives them 1d10, mana and HP regen, but loose the ability to move.
Lays a bunch of sharp stems in the ground which burst forth when stepped on, impaling the afflicted enemy and stopping them in their tracks.
Sends forth a rapid fire wave of leafs that can eviserate opponents from afar.

Creates a massive blast wave of razor sharp petals that flood from the caster and deals poison damage to all enemies, also if they fail the check to take half damamge  they also are rendered immobile for 4 turns.
Summons a Royal Dryad.
Summons a Elder Treeant
After two turns unleashes a devestation beam of light, only works during daylight.
Allows caster to communicate with Tree's, plants, and all manner of Flora.
Heals wounds to an extent. Can't heal large wounds.
Cures poison, acid and disease
Bonus AC +2
AOE healing of 2D4 per round
Passive attack buff for 1D6 rounds
Gives spells to others
Passive saving throw advantage for 1D6 rounds
Ranged Healing
Grants target 40 Temp HP, and allows them to recover a quarter of the spent mana for the duration of that Temp HP.
Emits a large field which makes Undead Flee.
Large burst of Healing onto a target, can heal large wounds.
Allows the Dispelling of greater afflictions, like petrification, or ritual curses.
Instant Revival spell provides 2d20 healing, or Refills 2 chance counts
Dm discreation advised, Only Omuns can resist a Wish.
Summons an Aspect of the Queen of the Fairy's who provides free healing spells for all within a massive area.
Grants 120 Temp Hp, +2 Bonus to Ac, Makes all attacks cost HALF AP, Reduces Movement to 10ft a turn.
Fires beams of damaging light Scales with mind magic book levels, amplifying dice per book learned
Read Target's mind Scales with Mind magic book levels
Allows the user to check for basic information of an item, scales with how high in Mind magic they are.
Allows caster to use objects as projectiles, or move them at will.
Affected person is unreasonable for durration.
Charms the target for the duration
Causes bloodthirst forcing the target to attack anyone in the vacinity
Forces target to sleep on a failed will save
Links a pair of minds for easy communication
Allows caster to create uillusions of anything, cannot actually harm people
Turns the caster and gear invisible, but does nothing to help the sound, also notable is some magic weapons or tiems will interfere with the invisibility
Paralyzes a target for a long length of time, this can work on all living beings, even warforged.
Causes the target to experience a physical ailment of awful intensity, deals damage every round.
Seizes control over a target's mind, making them do as the caster wishes.
Once cast this spell is always in affect, allows caster to cast spells mentally. No longer needing to speak the words.
Summons a Eye'd Horror to do it's master's bidding,
Turn into a merfolk
Temp blindness
Create a gyser of water
Allows underwater breathing
Gives caster a large crab claw inplace of hand
Envelops caster in a shell until dispelled or shattered
Covers in urchin armor spikes
Create a beam of water + 20 ft push back
Sting ray tail, can attack an extra time with it, it can deliver a dangerous lingering stunning poison
Grow a set of Shark jaws,
Gives caster 4 tentacles in place of one of their arms, can crush oponents or restrict them
Turns the Caster into water for a limited time, making them invulnerable, but not allowed to attack
Ignores AC, leaves opponent crippled
Grow a thresher shark tail, which can attack and cause Break, also moves target 1d4 squares
Creates an area of sheer darkness, this area makes all enemies inside it endure disadvantage on all checks made within it's reach.
Summons a Kraken to the batlefield
Calms storms or weather
Creates a rainstorm
Creates fog in your area that helps cloak allies from enemy attacks.
Cast 1D6 ray of hail
Modifier of fog for poison damage
Modifier of rain that slows
Modifier of rain that makes the rain oil. Can also be a ray of oil that deals no damage
Direct this blast of lighting to a spot of your chosing for an AOE adjcent to the center of the blast.
Modifier of rain, which creates highly volatile explosive liquid.
Fills the area  with a massive cloud of mist that reduces visibility to only 10ft around a person.
Plasters a target with smoldering burning ass, if the target gets hit three times or more, it combusts explosively. The only way to remove the Stacks is complete submersion in water.
Launches a burning projectile that upon impacting explodes into a 15 ft Cone.
Creates a storm of fire and brimstone from the heavens, WILL cause mass collateral damage. Explosive chunks of burning hail fall from the sky.
Unleashes a cloud of noxious toxic fumes, that seeks out ANY living targets near the spell and moves to them.
Confures a massive skywhale that blots out of the sun, and it unleashes a torrent of broken off sky barnacles, and Chitin spikes.

Creates a large storm that can be used with ank other sky spell to create a variety of storms, when used alone just creates a sizeable and long lived storm. Duration adjusts for how much mana is being pumped into the spell.
Sends out a shockwave that deals damage to each square it hits.
Control a small bolt of electricity
Create a coating on your armor that shocks your opponent on a successful melee attack against you.
Your hand acts like a tazer.
Deafening blast in a 3*3 area.
5*5 centered around you creating a shockwave that stuns as well as damages.
Direct electricity.
A bolt of electricity that can reach further than sparks.
Allows the Caster to add a charged version to any other spell, cast with this as a modifier, greatly enhances all aspects of other spell
Creates a pillar of lighting that moves around the battlefield wildly, seeking the nearest enemy target,
Creates a immense blastwave of thunder and lightning centered on the caster, It Can damage terrain and structures SIGNIFICANTLY.
Allows the Caster to move the Sparks spells to curve around obstacles or redirect them towards different targets. Can also be used on enemy Sparks magic.
Chain lighting that upon hitting an emeny will leap at least 15ft to hit the next enemy, ever enemy hit increases the total damage of the spell.
The caster fires a powerful beam of lightning for long range damage that can hit multiple targets in a line.
Summons a Thundering Clockwork Horror, equipped with a array of lightning based attacks

Creates a spontaneous lightning storm that the caster is locked into controlling for the next 6 turns. All Sparks spells cast during the duration will now originate from the clouds, and deal triple damage.
Summon a Bear
Summon a snake + stealth
Summon a crab of varying size
Summon 1 big wolf or 4 small wolves.
Summons a large lion
Summons a Gale Hawk, which can easily glide with the caster held  at it's talons. and has a series of wind based attacks.
Summons a massive Armored Rhino, an immense beast coated with thick plating of keratin capable of plowing through stone walls with ease.

When nearby coastline it summons a large shark of some variety, when not near coastline a shark seemingly falls from the sky, but it's a sky shark, flying predators that once were the scourge of the skylands.
Conjures an Illusory Leopard, a strange beast that can disappear at will and can leap out of shadows to attack it's foes.
Summons a massive elephant, ready to trample, gore or crush any who oppose the summoner.
Allows the summoner to combine their summons to create combination creatures.
Push back 1D4 spaces
Catch a projectile
Create a wind blade that slashes enemy
Catch things on a plane
Wind ball that pushes back 1D8 squares
Glides things down to ground or surface
plus 10 movement for 1D6+casting stat rounds
Shield of wind
Launches a condensed ball of wind that explodes on impact and sends anyone in the target area reeling. Enemies move 1-2 squares from the blast.
This spell while dealing low damage per square excells in making many opponents hurt each other as they are pulled into the swirling cyclone causing more damage the more enemies are pulled inside.
Unleashes a massive blast of wind centered on the caster, all targets nearby are forced prone or are flung 1d12 squares.
Lifts one target and deals massive wind damage to them.
Summons a massive Zephyr beast.

Causes the entire area to be filled with harsh winds, that reduce movement speed to 10 ft a turn for all but the caster.  Every turn targets in the zone will take 1d4 damage and be moved 1d4 in a random direction.
Grants the caster the ability of flight. Fly speed 45. This has to be upkept ever round.
Creates a swirling tornado that the Caster can move around the battlefield causing massive destructive where ever it goes, it moves 15ft a turn.
Summons snowballs that shoot from your hands/impliment
Icy Ray spell
Covers the battlefield in a foot of snow. Gain a +3 for Winter spells. Enemies slowed and Allies unaffected.
Freezes whatever is touched. Can cause frostbite to creatures if used enough.
Cools an area down
Creates an ice wall that can be in an occupied square.
Creates 4 icicles that can be fired from your hand.
Creates 1D4 Ice spears that can be fired.
Launches an explosive shard of ice that detonates on contact and flash freezes everything around it.
Creates a thick snowy path under the caster's feet, letting them creat pathways to areas normally unreachable. Enemies trying to ascend it have to make a save or fall down it.
A area marked by the caster begins beining assaulted by shards of ice that cascade from above, after duration is over the shards embedded in the ground make it difficult terrain.
Launches a massive snowflake buzzsaw of ice that can easily cut down tree's, people, and most wooden objects.
Creates a swirling blizzard, which begins dealing constant freezing damage to all enemies in the area.
Blasts a beam of freezing energy, freezing everything in it's path. A critical fail freezes target's into ice sculptures.
Conjurers a Wendigo Loyal to the caster,
Creates a swarm of massive icey wagon sized chunks of ice  that get launched at a target,
Small prayer beads that deal 1D6. Can "bless" water to be holy water.
Summons a barricade of holy light.
Hand based flash light.
Halo of detection for warning. An identifying circle of detection.
Creates a candle for light.
Creates a Will'O'Wisp that can do lots of small things like haunting or minor tricks.
Can move small objects around.
Raise an animal skeleton for a period of time.
Use in combination with healing magic to target curing
Use in combination with healing magic to target curing
Use in combination with healing magic to target curing
Use in combination with healing magic to target curing
Can Knapp flint if a large enough piece is in hand or it can condense knapped chunks of flint.
Can detect ores in a 15m radius. Precision is questionable.
Launches a pebble at target.
Crystallizes magic to adorn items. Non magical in nature. Also used to quickly attune to magical items.
Creates small wick flame. Used for light or to start a fire. Centered in palm.
Creates a handful of embers that can be thrown
It creates a flare that is launched upon casting.
Smoke bomb meant more for startle and doesn't obscure vision. OR it allows for smoking in cooking
Creates a diskus that can be thrown for 1D6.
Summons a temporary mallet for woodwork or thowing at morons for 1D4 damage.
Shoves someone either out of the way or off a cliff.
YEET!
Helps identify mushrooms. Can be cast on dead animals to grow mushrooms on it. Can be cast on faerie circles for a fun effect.
Can detect herbs in 15m radius. Allows a higher success rate in alchemy.
Creates a blanket of moss on touch. Used to temporarily bind or hide items
Can slightly age a tree. Can make plants sturdy as wood for climbing purposes. Can somewhat alter the shape of trees to allow for platforms.
Conjure a strip of linen to wrap a wound.
Minor healing 1D6
Takes away soreness and aches.
Allows bracing of broken bones using magic.
Allows you to take a picture of what you are currently looking at.
Summons a small bag's worth of marbles that can be scattered about.
Allows for distanced slapping of target.
Mental trickery of auditory or visual senses.
Creates brine solution, namely used in cooking. Can be cast for pocket salt. Super effective against slug based creatures
Allows for coconut to be cracked in half perfectly. Can summon a temporary coconut for a thrown attack before disappearing.
Summons Crusty the lobster. Can cook.
Allows for land detection in foggy or low light conditions when sailing. Can condense and harden sand into soft sandstone.
Acts like a paraglider to help ease down from heights.
Roll 1D6 for what light of rainbow is cast. Target takes 1D4 elemental damage based on light.
Small personal rain cloud.
Creates a vortex of wind to restrain someone, pulls targets in from 5ft around it, does no damage.
Storing electricity to allow a trap to function. Store magical energy in gemstones.
Seals and combined with elemental magic, empowers a trap.
A trigger point for a trap to be set off. Create a spark bolt for 1D4
Drawing connection circuits for traps
Creates a bedroll that lasts 12 hours.
Creates a temporary length of rope.
Creates a 2 man tent that lasts 12 hours.
Creates a temporary torch
Can fire one arrow when you dont have a bow.
Creates the thematic wind effect.
Air move whilest in air, allows for slight direction change.
Creates broom made of air, a vacuum if you will.
Can cool down whatever is touched.
Creates a shelter out of snow. Can create a cold chest. Can create ice cubes.
Temporarily damage with a flare of pine needles 1D20 needles worth 1 damage each.
Creates a sled / skiis / snowboard out of wood.
Summons a rain of arrows on enemies
Summons either a mystical weapon that can be commanded to do the summoner's bidding, or causes a weapon strike on a small area.
Covers caster in summoned plate armor that is just as durable as plate, but nowhere near as heavy. If hit with a spell in the armor, your regain half of the mana cost of the spell you were hit with.

When cast, pick an enemy that when you take damage, so to do they. Any damage brought against you is also brought against them. It also works that if they get healing, so to do you. Doesn't work on all creatures though.
An aura is created that, within it, anyone with foul intensions is rendered stunned or prone on a failed will save.
A shattered blast of shards made from devine light.
With your hand, create a V with your fingers and pull back a devine sling. If you can roll 2 hits, you deal a great deal of damage to the enemy.
Creates a beartrap like object that activates in close proximity to an enemy flinging itself onto a limb and closing. Must wait one turn after summoning before activating
Shotgun of bone shards from the palm of your hand.
Lashing spell that sends out a chain to hook yourself to, you can reel it into yourself or release it.
Releases a wave of magic that freezes everything temporarily in a decent perimeter.
Sends a burning dart of infernal magic at a target
Creates a pair of twirling sickle like blades that lash out at targets, and linger around the caster.
Modification spell used to corrupt any other spell into an infernal one, and increase it's damage potential.
Summons an Imp, that has 20 hp
Captures an enemy in a floating pentagram that requires a Hard DC to escape from.
A line of infernal flames that travels through the ground (without destroying it) to a target and erupts in a 2x2 blast
Creates a superheated war mace that is summoned into your dominant fighting hand.
Grows spines either your wings, tail or arms that can be fired to perform ranged attacks
Ray spell that spews vile sticky liquid in a cone, that sticks to the area.

Makes a dummy of infernal iron appear in the spot you had been and you move 15 ft away, or you can use it to create a shadowy version of yourself that mirrors your stats but has a quarter of your HP. Takes double damage from radiant spells.
Creates a sarcophagus that entombs the target for 1D6 rounds or until dispelled.
Creates a Tomb entrance which, after the casting modifier of turns, begins to spit out monsters of a certain variety.
Creates an urn that has something inside
Card blades that can be thrown.
Summons a card that can act as a purse. Gives advantage on Haggling
Summons a goblet that can be filled once with a liquid of your choosing, within reason. No potions. Mana cost varies by liquid being summoned.
Summons lesser healing ingredients.
Corpse explosion, better when combined with other elemental spells.
Mass animate
Summons random tombstones/hands/bones if in place of dead things.
Ghost gate teleport, one per encounter
3 Dagger crystals that shoot at a target
Tiny crystal shards that pepper a target
Gives a dark camoflauge, allowing you to blend into the shadows. You are harder to see. Advantage on sneak checks.
Ventriloquism or the ability to throw your voice around.
Creates an ice spike that fires from your hand
Creates an ice sheet on open water.
Creates den in ground that can be used for cover.
Summons a smattering of gravel that is launched from hand.
Indirect projectile, spike arises from out of the ground.
Flesh turns to stone. +7DR
Gives carapace shield or hardens body
Summons a moth or gives moth wings that can be used
Summons a spider that has different powers based on mana input
Summons a wasp that has different powers based on mana input
Takes one turn to charge or in at least knee deep water can be immediate. Creates bubble beam. Feet must be touching ground.
Sends out a length of kelp. Can be used to fasten things.
Creates a welling of water at the caster's feet. 6 inches deep.
Spray of water from hand.
Coral spike line.
Wall of water, can be held. Get two charges.
Summons 6 orbs of water to shoot, can hold up to three casts at once.
Water morter
Launches a ball of beach Detritus
Traps someone in a bubble
Moves all those hit by it 1D6 away from caster
One way verson of riptide moves enemies 1D10 away
Darkens area for 5 minutes.
Blinding or sneeze inducing dust that can be thrown at an opponenet.
Allows caster to have night vision for 10 minutes.
6 small orbs of light that look like stars.
Gives shield on arm which acts as a mirror, reflecting any spell but will shatter on contact with a physical attack, stopping it but shattering.
